Package at.ofai.gate.virtualdocuments

Class Summary
AnnotateBySpecPR This PR takes an annotation specification list (see AnnotatedDocumentTransformer) and creates new annotations according to which of the annotations in the list were found.
AnnotatedDocumentTransformer A class that can be used to extract a string (with AnnotatedDocumentTransformer.getStringForDocument(Document, String)) or a sequence of annotations (with AnnotatedDocumentTransformer.getIterator(Document, String) from an annotated document based on a list of annotation specifications and a list of processing options which have to be provided when an object of this class is created.
AnnotationParm  
CopyVirtualDocumentPR This creates a virtual document and copies it to the output corpus.
ExportContainedAnnotationsPR This PR takes the name of a containing annotation type, a contained annotation type name and a feature name.
IndirectLanguageAnalyserPR This Language Analyser Processing Resource creates a virtual document based on the annotation specification and processing options, runs some language analyser PR on the virtual document and maps the annotations created for the virtual document back to the original document.
OffsetMapping This class provides a mapping between ranges of text within two documents.
ReplaceByVirtualDocumentPR This PR converts an existing, annotated document into a new document where the document text is created in various possible ways from the original text covered by specific annotation types, from the values of features of specific annotations or optionally from the original document text if no such specific annotation types are present at some location.
TextForSpecIterator
